scripts.clean:debug:
reset; echo "==========
Cleaning solution: Debug ...
==========
" ; /bin/bash -vc "dotnet clean -c Debug ./src/cli/cli.csproj"
scripts.clean:release:
reset; echo "==========
Cleaning solution: Release ...
==========
" ; /bin/bash -vc "dotnet clean -c Release ./src/cli/cli.csproj"
scripts.build:debug:
reset; echo "==========
Building solution: Debug ...
==========
" ; /bin/bash -vc "dotnet publish -c Debug --self-contained true --use-current-runtime ./src/cli/cli.csproj"
scripts.build:release:
reset; echo "==========
Cleaning solution: Release ...
==========
" ; /bin/bash -vc "dotnet publish -c Release --self-contained true --use-current-runtime ./src/cli/cli.csproj"
